p: The Ct values were recorded for each sample, with lower Ct values indicating higher viral loads. Based on the Ct values, patients were classified into the following severity groups: mild (non-ICU): Ct values > 30 (lower viral load), moderate (non-intubated ICU): Ct values 20–30 (moderate viral load), severe/critical (intubated ICU): Ct values < 20 (high viral load). Ten healthy individuals who tested negative for COVID-19 (Ct values ≥ 40 or undetectable) were included as the control group.
